name: StartMeApp
tag_list: mobile, advertising, publishers, developers, brands, agencies, advertisers
overview:
An independent, privately owned mobile advertising network, StartMeApp is Latin America’s leading mobile ad network and an emerging innovator in global mobile advertising, serving mobile ads in 100 countries across the Americas, Europe, Asia and Africa.

Currently delivering 10 billion mobile ad impressions monthly, with ad impressions forecast to increase to 30 billion monthly in 2013, StartMeApp runs tens of thousands of effective brand campaigns annually for clients that include well-known global and regional corporate brands, such as: Audi, Air France, Fox, Peugeot, Adidas, Allianz, Microsoft, Claro, Despegar.com and others.

StartMeApp’s ad-serving technology connects its network with all principle ad networks, ad exchanges and content publishers worldwide, utilizing a unique RTB algorithm that enables automated optimization of a client’s advertising budget, determining in real-time which sources of inventory are most suited to provide the client with optimal advertising results.

StartMeApp’s unique ad-serving capabilities combine with the extensive mobile expertise and experience of StartMeApp management and staff to provide the highest possible return on mobile advertising investment for clients in Latin America, the U.S. Hispanic market and mobile advertising markets worldwide.

To learn more about StartMeApp and the global mobile advertising opportunities available to its clients, visit: www.StartMeApp.com.
